column2: "A new Matter Board has been formed. A balance has been reached, and the outcome will soon become apparent."
"What you attain does not have a form, and yet, that is the desired form."
"You must continue as you see fit. It does not require deep thought."
"But you must know, the answer that you seek is not the answer for countless others."
"Whatever difficulties you face, the purpose will become clear in due time."
"This is something you will come to understand."
"That is why I would like you to continue forward without hesitation."
"I believe that you will find the path that leads to all the answers."
